about.p2: Based in Ifrane, we know every street and every neighborhood. Our promise: your order delivered in a maximum of 30 minutes.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our service in Ifrane.
faq.q1: What areas do you deliver in Ifrane?
faq.a1: We deliver across all of Ifrane city ‚Äî all neighborhoods, hotels, university residences, and commercial zones.
faq.q2: How much does delivery cost in Ifrane?
faq.a2: Our rates start from 15 MAD for a standard Ifrane delivery. The final price depends on distance and order type.
faq.q3: How do I place a delivery order?
faq.a3: Simply send us a WhatsApp message with your address and what you need. No forms, no app required.
faq.a4: Yes, we deliver medications from all pharmacies in Ifrane. Have your prescription ready if required.
faq.a5: Our standard delivery time is 30 minutes maximum within Ifrane. In most cases, we deliver even faster.
faq.a6: Yes, we're available 7 days a week, from 08:00 to 22:00.
